description:

reMarkable Paper Pro https://amzn.to/3YhYhdM (amazon affiliate link) 

The Paper pro is reMarkabe's follow up the the popular Remarkable 2. It's faster, a bit bigger and is sporting a color screen with a back light. But how is is for drawing?
